properties.widgets.Trash-batchsink: {"metadata":{"spec-version":"1.0"},"configuration-groups":[{"label":"Trash Configuration","properties":[{"widget-type":"textbox","label":"Reference Name","name":"referenceName","description":"Reference specifies the name to be used to track this external source","widget-attributes":{"default":"Trash"}}]}]}
properties.doc.Trash-batchsink:
# Trash

Trash consumes all the records on the input and eats them all,
means no output is generated or no output is stored anywhere.
